privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Carteron Industries, we highly value the protection of your personal data and privacy.
privacy.section1_text:
We only collect the information strictly necessary for the site's operation and to handle your requests via our contact form (name, email address, message, etc.).
No data is shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy.section2_text:
Our site does not use cookies for tracking, advertising, or analytics purposes.
Only technical cookies essential for the site's proper functioning may be used.
privacy.section3_text:
The information you send via the contact form is only used to respond to your inquiries.
It is not sold or used for commercial purposes.
privacy.section4_text: We implement all necessary measures to ensure the security of your data.
privacy.section5_text: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at: ton-email@domaine.com
privacy.section6_text: This privacy policy may be updated at any time. We encourage you to check it regularly.

privacy_banner: We do not collect any personal data for commercial or advertising purposes. Your privacy is respected.

founder_modal.title: Lamia Carteron — Founder
founder_modal.desktop_tagline: Bridging automotive engineering excellence with family-centered golf innovation
founder_modal.vision_text: Making golf more accessible and enjoyable for families through innovative technology that combines performance with practicality.
background_items: Expert in electric & hybrid vehicle optimization
founder_modal.today_text: Combining passion for engineering, golf, and family life to create the revolutionary 2-in-1 electric golf stroller that transforms how parents experience the game.

carousel.side_desc: Driven by innovation, Carteron Industries creates solutions at the crossroads of sports, family, and technology. We are inventing the first 2-in-1 electric golf cart that carries both clubs and baby, so the passion for golf can be shared with the whole family.
carousel.about_intro: Carteron Industries represents a modern vision of mobility. Founded on systems engineering expertise, the company develops intelligent solutions for the agricultural world and outdoor leisure. We believe in useful, sustainable technology adapted to field realities.
carousel.about_parcours: PhD engineer in electronics and physics, Lamia Carteron founded Carteron Industries after more than 15 years of R&D experience in optimizing thermal, hybrid, electric vehicles and agricultural machinery. She has collaborated with major names in the automotive industry and agricultural sector. Today, she puts her expertise at the service of an innovative solution in the leisure domain, the result of a unique combination between her passion for automotive engineering, her love for golf and her family life.

innovation.name: Next-Gen Electric Golf Trolleys
innovation.desc: Redefining comfort and performance on the course.
innovation.popup: Lightweight, easy to fold, and thoughtfully designed. Our next-generation electric trolleys include intuitive guidance features to enhance your golf experience — delivering premium performance without the premium price tag.

startup.name: 2-in-1 Hybrid Trolley
startup.popup: An original concept that brings together the practicality of a golf trolley and the convenience of a stroller. Currently in development, this solution is designed for parents who want to enjoy the game without giving up family time.

work.name: Innovation in Action
work.popup: We create practical innovations that help golfers and families enjoy more comfort, convenience, and quality time — making each round of golf feel effortless and more rewarding.

community.name: Golf for Everyone
community.desc: Creating a more welcoming game for all generations.
community.popup: We believe golf should be inclusive and family-friendly. Our approach encourages clubs to embrace new solutions that attract diverse players, support parents, and make the sport accessible to more people — shaping the future of the game together.

card1.title: Agricultural System Engineering
card1.desc: We support agricultural manufacturers and equipment suppliers in the design, development, and optimization of their technical systems. Our approach relies on systems engineering, functional analysis, and field expertise to ensure robust, sustainable, and profitable solutions.

card2.title: Web & Mobile Apps for Agricultural Weighing
card2.desc: Our digital solution allows logging and managing weighing operations via intuitive interfaces connected to tractors with front loaders. Optimize your logistics, save time, and enjoy full traceability.

card3.title: Electric Golf Trolleys
card3.desc: Designed for passionate golfers, our electric trolleys combine comfort, range, and ergonomics. With quiet motors and intuitive controls, they transform the playing experience on the course.

card4.title: 2-in-1 Stroller & Golf Trolley Hybrid
card4.desc: This hybrid trolley brings together the practicality of a golf cart and the comfort of a stroller. Still in development, it is created to let parents enjoy golf while keeping their child close — balancing sport and family without compromise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our 2-in-1 electric golf trolley stroller.

faq1.q: What exactly does CARTERON Industries offer?
faq1.a: We are developing a 2-in-1 electric golf trolley stroller: an innovative solution that safely carries your golf clubs, accessories, and a baby seat in one practical design.

faq2.q: Why combine a golf trolley and a stroller?
faq2.a: Because parents shouldn’t have to choose between family time and their favorite sport. Our solution lets you play golf while keeping your child close, safely and effortlessly.

faq3.a:
It’s one of the first hybrid solutions designed to connect leisure and family life.
- Electric assistance with safe speed control.
- Lightweight yet robust frame, easy to fold.
- Quick switch between trolley and stroller modes.

faq4.q: What are the benefits for users?
faq4.a:
- Comfort: no more juggling a heavy golf bag and stroller.
- Health: reduces fatigue and strain.
- Family: enjoy more quality time on the course.
- Convenience: folds easily and lasts a full round.

faq5.q: Is it safe for the baby?
faq5.a:
Yes. Safety is our top priority:
- Baby seat meets childcare safety standards.
- Stable design with efficient brakes.
- Easy-to-use controls.
- Testing planned in collaboration with partner golf clubs.

faq6.q: Do golf clubs allow this type of equipment?
faq6.a: Yes, many clubs welcome family-friendly solutions, especially during quieter hours. We work closely with golf clubs to ensure compatibility and acceptance.

faq7.a: Our goal is to offer excellent value — more accessible than buying a premium trolley and a high-end stroller separately. Several versions will be available for different needs.

faq8.a:
- Parents who want to keep playing golf without sacrificing family time.
- Clubs aiming to attract family-friendly golfers.
- Grandparents and golf enthusiasts who want to share their passion with the next generation.

faq9.a: The project is led by Lamia Carteron, PhD engineer with 15 years of R&D experience in automotive and agricultural machinery. Her expertise and passion for golf and family life ensure a carefully designed, reliable solution.

faq10.q: When will the product be available?
faq10.a: We are entering the development and testing phase. Launch will follow after prototype validation and safety certification.

steps.title: Innovation, Step by Step
steps.description: Discover how Carteron Industries is reinventing golf with a unique 2-in-1 electric stroller trolley, designed for parents who love the game.

step1.title: 1. Carry Everything with Ease
step1.desc: Transport your golf clubs, equipment, and your baby safely in one lightweight, robust structure.

step2.title: 2. Smart Electric Assistance
step2.desc: Motorized drive, stable speed control uphill and downhill, and long-lasting battery autonomy for a full round.

step3.title: 3. Safety & Comfort First
step3.desc: Secure seat for your baby, easy folding system, stable brakes, and ergonomic handling for peace of mind.

step4.title: 4. Family-Friendly Golf
